Summary Note:
The RM has known Schneider Wagner Lang since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
Schneider Wagner Lang is a 63 year old retired Trading Desk Manager from Austria.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, he chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Schneider Wagner Lang is married to Beatrix. Their child is  named Leonie.
Education Background:
Schneider received his secondary school diploma from Bundesgymnasium und Bundesrealgymnasium Leoben in 1981.
Schneider pursued higher education at Modul University Vienna, graduating in 1984.
Occupation History:
Schneider Wagner Lang is a 63 year old retired Trading Desk Manager from Austria. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Schneider Wagner Lang's first role was as a Junior Trader at OMV AG, where he worked diligently from 1985 to 1987 to establish a strong reputation.
He then transitioned to Voestalpine AG as a Senior Trader, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1988 to 1993.
At Gunvor Group, he worked as a Trading Desk Manager from 1995 till retirement, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 870000 EUR.
He has townhouse located in Bregenz, worth 871000 EUR.

He purchased villa in Saalfelden, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 20000000 EUR.
On top of that he inherited a beautiful villa in Tulln an der Donau, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 2400000 EUR.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
